html:
4.19.17  1:14 pm   Thoughts on 2017 so far?

     i have been working on a video the entire time, which i started in 2016

4.19.17  12:46 pm   Do you think the video you're making is suitable for children?

     they will have to try it and see if it suits them

4.19.17  12:39 pm   my attempt to fix the limerick: bill works on the video all day, but his fans just question and say, hotweig is so cool, just release it you fool! so he keeps working and says "okay"

     ah, that makes more sense
4.19.17  12:24 pm   Why do you always type in lowercase?

4.19.17  12:20 pm   When do you normally update the questions page?

     right now

4.19.17  12:06 pm   are you asleep?

     no

4.19.17  11:48 am   I broke one of the laws of physics, and the and got arrested by the universe police. I need a lawyer to defend me in space court. You seem to know a lot about the structure of the universe. Can you defend me.

     it didn't happen

4.19.17  11:17 am   Can you double the frame rate of the video without adding render time by just doubling the speed of the video?

     sure but then the video would be twice as fast

4.19.17  11:10 am   what's something interesting about biology?

     something's alive in the ocean
4.19.17  11:07 am   can you ask us a question?
4.19.17  10:58 am   hello bill i have a music ueqstion - when you write a song do you do the lyrics first or the melody/chords first

4.19.17  8:49 am   Will the average viewer be able to catch everything in your new video without having to pause?

     no

4.19.17  4:10 am   i feel that the videos on your website take a longer time to load compared to videos on youtube

     that's true, but the advantage is you only have to 'load them once, and then you can horse around with the playback much more readily (start/stop, back forward, etc). Or you can use youtube if you prefer, the advantage there is they will tell you what to watch next, and sometimes even what to buy, or who to vote for in the next election

4.19.17  2:05 am   would you please tell me a little bedtime story?

     once upon a time there was a bed

4.19.17  1:32 am   Is the creation of HOTEWIG effecting your mental health?

     i am working on content at the same pace i have been since 2014. and i think working on content steadily has generally had positive effect, because there is always something to do

4.19.17  1:07 am   Which time zone is the best time zone?

      the one that corresponds to the area you are in and/or doing business in

4.19.17  1:03 am   Do you like cell phones?

     they are ok
4.19.17  12:52 am   Are you ever gonna do another one of those videos like the history of Japan?

4.19.17  12:37 am   why did japan bomb pearl harbour

     to invite the united states into world war 2

4.19.17  12:22 am   Who's going to win the French presidential election?

     i don't know, it's probably going to be a close race
4.19.17  12:19 am   Can you make the history of Germany video?

4.19.17  12:08 am   do you predict that hotewig will be your longest video for a while?

     yes

     or do you have a concept in mind that you want to do, that would be a similar length

4.18.17  11:59 pm   can you cook a stove?

     probably

4.18.17  11:18 pm   wait so if you can start the apocalpyse

     which i cannot

      then are you some kind of deity

4.18.17  11:08 pm   what do you think of your fans???

     i don't exactly know how to tell who is one

4.18.17  11:03 pm   oh yes please do the commentary thing where you talk extensively about hoj/hotewig. are you serious about doing it? I think we'd all really appreciate it.

     i would like to do a massive amount of behind the scenes material. it is one of the many things that i would like to do a massive amount of, and is on my to do list

4.18.17  11:02 pm   What is the question?

     "What is the question?"

4.18.17  10:58 pm   It reality is an illusion and existence has no meaning, why do you fill the miniscule time you have in this life making videos for these puny mortals to consume with their senses?

     how else am i gonna win friends

4.18.17  10:55 pm   have you ever considered making an autobiography solely in Microsoft Paint?

     no

4.18.17  10:54 pm   How many potatoes can I fit into I 30 minute video about cats?

     less than the number of cats, presumably

4.18.17  10:36 pm   do you like my limerick? bill works on the video all day, but his fans just question and say. hotweig is so cool, just release it you fool! and all he can say is not yet.

     it is ok except for the last line. you are not making it clear that the reason it is not released yet is because it is not finished, and i am working to finish it as fast as humanly possible. from the way you wrote it, it could possibly be misconstrewed to look like i am somehow 'choosing' to 'wait' before releasing it, which would be irresponsible and insane, especially after having been stuck working on it for such a long time and people asking me every day if i'm 'dead' or 'why' i 'stopped making videos.' if there is any way you could re-write the last line to more accurately reflect the situation, i think i would be more comfortable with it

4.18.17  10:18 pm   there was a question on this page a while ago about how everyone asks different variations of the same questions and how it shows that it's too hard to be original and how humans are all the same and boring, and naturally, it did not feel good reading that. but today i had the thought that maybe something being common doesn't necessarily mean it can't have value. do u think this is reasonable?

     of course
4.18.17  10:16 pm   Phones?

4.18.17  9:52 pm   are you ever going to sell any video?

     if it makes sense

4.18.17  9:52 pm   did this question page teach you something about your audience?

     some of the audience

4.18.17  9:49 pm   i'm struggling to find the project i want to work on

     talk it out. ask questions and answer them
4.18.17  9:36 pm   since you mentioned earlier that you like physics can you give us a physics lesson?

4.18.17  9:28 pm   Do you have some signature dance moves?

     being born
4.18.17  9:20 pm   when was this website launched?

4.18.17  9:18 pm   have you thought about disabling the comments when hotewig is released?

     no

     it might be counterproductive but in the end does that really matter?

     i'm not sure but i will not disable comments

4.18.17  8:48 pm   How do I not be mad about things I can fix?

     try to fix them, i guess

4.18.17  8:32 pm   learn any sick keyboard shortcuts recently?

     if you want to scroll immediately to the top of a huge folder, but you keep pressing command-up (that works in a text document, and in most environments, but in folders it knocks you out to the enclosing folder) option-up will do the trick. now if i could only re-learn to use command-up instead of option-up when i'm in a document

4.18.17  8:14 pm   What do you think the moon tastes like?

     rocks, i guess
4.18.17  7:49 pm   what question should I ask you?

4.18.17  7:48 pm   do you find it odd that everybody you've met has spent time with you? pretty weird that they all share that commonality that you lack, you've only ever BEEN you and never gotten the chance to meet yourself.

     i know myself very well, and i have spent a lot of time with myself

4.18.17  7:48 pm   How do I build a squirrel

     get 2 other squirrels, and make them love each other

4.18.17  7:35 pm   x=1, find y

      ok i found it
4.18.17  7:34 pm   when did you start the questions page?

4.18.17  7:31 pm   How do you come up with your stuff?

     by surprise

4.18.17  7:30 pm   If you could have a conversation with any musician, living or dead, would you?

     sure. and i do, quite often
